An aboleth weighs about 6,500 pounds. Aboleths are cruel and highly intelligent, mak- ing them dangerous pred- ators. They know many ancient and terrible secrets, for they inherit their parents’ knowl- edge at birth and assimilate the memories of all they consume. Aboleths are smart enough to refrain from immediately attacking land dwellers who draw near. Instead they hang back, hoping their prey will enter the water, which they often make appear cool, clear, and refreshing with their powers of illusion. Aboleths also use their psionic abilities to ABOLETH MAGE enslave individuals for use against their own companions.
